item.title: MIUI OS2.0.6.0.UMQCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 12 5G / Note 12R Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 12 5G / Note 12R Pro China

Codename: sunstone

Version: OS2.0.6.0.UMQCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: 29df442157b265f3857dd1ec74eaf340

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Unexpected reboots occurred
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
